original_prompt:
<ide_opened_file>The user opened the file \temp\readonly\Task tool input (xerzsm) in the IDE. This may or may not be related to the current task.</ide_opened_file>
Using the architecture and specification document, develop a comprehensive and granular to-do list, where task scope adheres to the ralph principle (task scope must be able to be described without the use of the word "and").

Once the list is completed, perform the following in an iterative RALPH loop using ULW:

- identify next incomplete task in task list
- implement that task
- update the task list
- next
